__e: Okay, listen, I understand this is difficult, but we need to be sure of exactly what happened.
But, then again, you never quite know what you're capable of, either.
What you should do, Michael, is have a doctor take a look at it, 'cause we don't really know what that is.
What are the odds? - Well, it's like i said.
Is one woman never enough for some men?
Well, you know, some men have it and- What are you talking about?
Let's run this just so we know we're all on the same page.
No way to know for sure this is the right one.
Well, then we can't necessarily conclude it's the same fella, can we ? Come on.
We want to make sure one of them didn't kill him.
Yeah, are you sure she didn't just take off? Is that... I mean, you called her friends and everything?
Are you certain that he isn't still out there alive?
Yeah, are you sure she didn't just take off? Is that... I mean, you called her friends and everything?
I mean, how can we be certain the father is with the two kids?
But we don't know for sure you are who you say you are.
Uh, well, I... okay, I guess she didn't tell you, but, uh, that's me too to some degree, so... just wanna make sure all the cards are on the table.
All I know is I have lost touch with the things that I love, With the music, with my life in a way, you know?
I was afraid of people and to some extent I still am, let me tell you.
There's always some part of me that's thinking about him.
But it's those things you say in difficult moments.
We have moments when I feel so close to you, especially when you're inside me, but then you don't want to talk, and I wonder why you really came for me and took me away from my child.
I know, father, but I feel that God is asking me to help those people and I'm often there until very late.
I mean, the way I feel somedays... if I didn't know why i felt like I do, because of all the god stuff... All I can say is, it's... it's amazing you are you.
Well, some days it's not true, and today you don't mean it.
